org.shared.net.nio

Class NioManagerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.shared.net.nio.NioManagerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Runnable, EnumStatus<NioManagerThread.NioManagerThreadStatus>, SourceLocal<NioEvent<?>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NioManagerDispatchThread, NioManagerIoThread

    public abstract class NioManagerThread
extends Thread
implements SourceLocal<NioEvent<?>>, Closeable, EnumStatus<NioManagerThread.NioManagerThreadStatus>
    An abstract base class for NioManager service threads.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NioManagerThread.NioManagerThreadStatus
      An enumeration of thread states.
      static class  NioManagerThread.Request<I,O>
      A subclass of FutureTask for signaling manager threads and retrieving their internal states.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        Thread.State, Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

                      I argument,
                      NioConnection conn)

        O - the output type.
        Parameters:

        argument - the input argument.
        conn - the originating NioConnection.
